div.bibl: Svenska Kuriren, Feb. 13, 1919KILLED AND INJURED-WAR DEPARTMENT LIST

body.p: Corporal Christ Johnson, 12216 Wallace Street, killed;
George A. Anderson, 4019 Diversey Boulevard, died of an illness;
Albin J. Carlson, 1430 Edgewater Avenue, injured.
Albert V. Johnson, 6625 South Marshfield Avenue, injured;
Chester J. Malmquist, 2044 Greenwich Avenue, injured;
Gust E. Adamson, 5938 West Iowa Street; (?)
Sergeant Harold B. Knudsen, 1221 St. Lawrence Avenue, Minor injuries;
Sergeant Charles C. Anderson, 1908 South Dearborn Street, Minor injuries.
